tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (CC But) (VP (VP (VB be) (ADJP (JJ sure) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT the) (NNP Lord))))) (CC and) (VP (VP (VB serve) (NP (PRP him)) (ADVP (RB faithfully)) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT all) (PRP$ your) (NN #heart)))) (: ;) (VP (VB consider) (NP (WP what)) (NP-TMP (NP (JJ great) (NNS things)) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBZ has) (VP (VBN done) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP you))))))))))) (. .)))
